abstract: BP, in its second big deal in two months, agreed to buy a 30 percent stake in the Indian oil and natural gas fields of Reliance Industries.
snippet: BP, in its second big deal in two months, agreed to buy a 30 percent stake in the Indian oil and natural gas fields of Reliance Industries.
lead_paragraph: BP said on Monday that it would pay $7.2 billion to buy into India’s fast-growing oil and natural gas business, the company’s second big deal in two months, according to The New York Times.

headline.main: BP to Buy Stake in Reliance’s Oil and Gas Fields for $7.2 Billion
